title: A Woman Tricked by Fake Celebrity Scammers
summary: A woman named Jane was tricked by scammers who pretended to be the famous actor Jason Momoa on Facebook. They started chatting and moved to WhatsApp, saying it was safer. The scammers also acted like Momoa's agent, lawyer, and even his daughter. They asked Jane for money for things like flights to meet him and gifts for his daughter. Over time, she lost £80,000 from her inheritance. Jane felt very sad and stupid but is sharing her story to help others avoid similar scams. She hopes people will be careful online and not trust strangers who ask for money.

background_read: Online scams happen when people pretend to be someone else to trick you into giving money. Celebrities are often used because many people admire them. It's important to never send money to strangers online and to tell a trusted adult if something seems suspicious. Always check if an account is real by looking for official verification.
